metadata.name: The Final Plague
metadata.description:
The Final Plague has begun, and with it mankind's final hours. 

Can a rural Iowan family survive the initial onslaught of crazed, rabid animals, presumably the product of a mutated super-virus? Or will they succumb to the plague that threatens to end all life as we know it? 

From the creator of Top Shelf's BB Wolf and the 3 LPs.
